disableGutters.description: If `true`, the left and right padding is removed.
disableGutters.name: disableGutters

fixed.description:
Set the max-width to match the min-width of the current breakpoint.
This is useful if you'd prefer to design for a fixed set of sizes
instead of trying to accommodate a fully fluid viewport.
It's fluid by default.
fixed.name: fixed

maxWidth.description:
Determine the max-width of the container.
The container width grows with the size of the screen.
Set to `false` to disable `maxWidth`.
maxWidth.name: maxWidth

sx.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.
sx.name: sx
